website_summaries.verdict: The Microsoft LifeCam HD-6000 for notebooks offers impressive HD video output quality and excellent sound definition over previous models for an overall smooth video-chatting experience, but the continual autofocus feature can be distracting to your chat partner. Nevertheless, we recommend the Microsoft LifeCam HD-6000, if you have the proper system requirements.
pros: 720p HD video quality at 30 frames per second, 360-degree rotation
LifeCam desktop software offers fun 3D video effects

customer_reviews.title: Camera for computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, I needed a camera for my computer so we could help out with homeschooling the grandkids. The picture quality is first rate and the plug and play made the install a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dot B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very highly sensitive microphone in it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very highly sensitive microphone in it. The image quality is superb. I have attached the clip on top of my LED TV and is connected to laptop which is connected to TV all the time. Ss, my normal LED TV is smart now with Windows 10 and this camera works for skype, hangout etc. One thing of note is that the focus will keep shifting if you move which is kind of annoying. I give 1 less star for that
customer_reviews.author: Shahab

customer_reviews.title: I have tried following directions found on youtube but nothing works to correct this terrible function (auto focus) When I skype
customer_reviews.text: The auto focus is an absolute nightmare. I have tried following directions found on youtube but nothing works to correct this terrible function (auto focus) When I skype my family they cannot look at the screen because of the constant changing focus. I wish I had read reviews before purchasing this product, I am very disappointed. I can't imagine some people giving this a good rating. I only gave it a two star because I don't hate anything (one star) and the auto is good. We can at least talk to eachother, guess I could just us the telephone. A very unhappy customer
customer_reviews.author: Ray McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Fair. Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: The camera came with the bracket broken without springs. I didn't try to replace it, because it was not worth my time (and money) to ship it back. Now the bracket has completely broken off. I got it to work with Linux. It required recompiling the kernel on openSuSE. The microphone worked for it was not simple enough for my daughter. I blame openSuSE for that. The resolution is okay, not superb, but it works well enough. Not likely going to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Gimp

customer_reviews.title: freezing issues
customer_reviews.text: Windows 8.1 is installed on my ultra-book computer which don't have a CD-ROM reader too. I downloaded win8 drivers for webcam but I encountered freezing issues when I am using Skype or windows "camera" application. I solved this problem with two solutions below: - uninstall lifecam program completely so windows just uses "stock" driver. but you don't have the chance to disable auto-focus completely. Every time you should disable it if you are using your camera. - also to disable to auto-focus completely, install windows7 drivers from Microsoft website for your windows8.1 operating system.  everything works for me now
customer_reviews.author: boorock

customer_reviews.title: Better than built in cam, but no so good
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't return this cam was because I bought it at a very cheap price. Right after I bought it amazon changed the price to almost double. The camera runs out of focus constantly at every light condition, even if I don't move. Quality is not so great either. I don't know how they say it's HD, but I can definitely see my picture pixelated. I'm not much of a heavy webcam user. I just use it couple of times a month to chat with family. If I was a pro user, or had to pay more than what I did, I would return this cam for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ara

customer_reviews.title: Piece of s××t they are trying to screw you over with.
customer_reviews.text: This camea is junk. Returned it because it kept trying to "AUTOFOCUS" even if I was perfectly still. Company charged me 15% restocking fee because they said it was ok. If that was ok their quality control sucks and blind. Never again. I hope this persuades someone else to make same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KEEP BUGGING ME AMAZON (write a review they say in many emails this better stop)
customer_reviews.text: I have already left feedback here, rated 5 stars "at least" then and now the same. An excellent cam, especially for the ridiculously low price. Just plug-n-play works in very high definition. It also works well in low light, it does auto-focus and the image sometimes blurs but not annoying though. A must buy if you have a desktop and want a great cam for the price NOW ARE YOU SATISFIED AMAZON, LEAVE ME ALONE ABOUT THIS AMAZON....#JERKS
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a peice of crap. It constantly, CONSTANTLY has issues focusing and will just sit there and focus back and forth for its entire use unless I disable it each and every time. There are many better choices out there, look to logitech if you want a decent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected application
customer_reviews.text: Outdoor webcam? Not its intended purpose but that is where my first HD-6000 is and operating for almost a year now. It works in conjunction with my weather station website KWAGOLDB6, from dawn to dusk. Simple and inexpensive. Just bought this second one to use as it was intended and to replace a built-in one that failed. It is sold as a "Webcam for Notebooks" and yes, it works for that too! The HD-6000 is all good at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: SEH

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I received the Microsoft LifeCam HD 6000 today and think its pretty awesome. I use it for skyping and making video blogs and it does the job just fine. Unless you're a hard core youtube blogger or something, I can't see much reason in buying anything else. It does 720p HD videos and its clarity is awesome and the color is absolutely brilliant. So unless you need 1080p, I totally suggest this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Could you ask for more?
customer_reviews.text: I doubt you should! This is a superb web cam, especially for the price! I did much research and came to the final decision on this little guy. As long as your internet connection is up to standard, then the video will be in HD! My friends and family have all confirmed this, "Wow, the picture looks great!" When the internet connection slows, any web cam will see a decrease in performance. + The clip is even big enough to latch on to my chunky laptop lid. Nice rubber/foam that does not damage lid either. - Still photos are not that great. But video quality, absolutely excellent. + Quality for the price! The bottom line. Happy shopping!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new webcam and microphone because the ones that were built into my laptop were horrible. The sound comes in perfectly clear and you can shoot videos in 720p with it so it works great. The only thing I don't like is that it auto focuses about every ten seconds which is annoying. You can turn this off in the software that comes with it but you will have to keep turning it off because the settings don't save when you turn off your computer. Other than that I love this webcam!
customer_reviews.author: phoenix923

customer_reviews.title: buy it
customer_reviews.text: I use this webcam once a week for my podcast . it connects fine with Google, Facebook , Skype and all the other programs it re focuses a bit if you have funky lighting in your room . but hey ill take and auto focus over twisting a lens any day. Same as the others say it was intended for notebook (size is perfect for desktop yada yada) but they do only give you like a 20 inch cord plan on a extension .
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you READ the system requirements and know what your system has!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this without looking at the requirements because it was such a good deal at $20. My laptop is a single core at 2.0 GHz and the webcam needs a dual-core at 1.6GHz. I did not know my laptop was a single-core until after I tried to install this webcam the installation told me my system didn't meet the requirements even though its 2GHz and has 2Gb of RAM. So now I have to return it and get a low quality webcam for my turtle of a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: i3r

customer_reviews.title: MS LifeCam review.
customer_reviews.text: Compact cam with clip for mounting on Notebook only, not applicable to attachment to LCD Monitors without making custom adjustment. Pros: nice defination compared to other cam in same dollar range. Clarity seemed fine but I'm not sure it is 720p quality. Con: Cord is too short for PC, but ok for laptop. Auto Focus keeps on adjusting while viewing cam, stops if you don't nove. Also there is no off preference for the auto focus.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This camera performs exactly as advertised and doesn't cost too much. After my second logitech camera broke I decided to try another brand and step up to HD while I was at it. I wasn't sure the bandwidth could support HD, and I'm still not sure if it actually does, but those on the other end of my connection always comment on how good my picture is. The camera has a mic as well which works very well. It's Microsoft so it works seamlessly with Windows 7 and, unlike my last logitech camera install, the software and drivers install quickly. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Autofocus never stops. No support from Microsoft.
customer_reviews.text: It kept autofocusing through the range during calls. It was so bad that people ended up telling me during a meeting to just shut off my video as it was driving them crazy. No support from Microsoft--it was a total waste of money and the last webcam I'll buy from Microsoft. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H

customer_reviews.title: HD LIFECAM 6000
customer_reviews.text: By far, this is the best HD webcam that I have used. It was easy to set up and connect. I used it first to have my kids video call their cousins in New York (I'm in Atlanta) and the first thing they said was "...WOW! I can see you real clear! That must be a good webcam!" Since I've had it, there have been no issues and I'm trying to find ways to use it more! I just started taking pictures with it ... WOW! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: DeeHill

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed by the quality and the price
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality is excellent - easy to set up. Many cameras warn you that pictue quality will be affected by bright lights in the room and other USB connections and advises you to unplug them - can't do that because the connections are my keyboard, mouse, printer, etc. I loaded the software, plugged in the camera and was amazed at the clarity of the picture - even in brightly lit room.
customer_reviews.author: AttyCasner

customer_reviews.title: a little bit annoying. Also the cord is too short
customer_reviews.text: It keeps adjusting focus one no one is in front of camera and the auto focus is enabled, a little bit annoying. Also the cord is too short. Further, the clip is only good on top of laptop, I have no way to clip it on my lcd monitor screen.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ru

customer_reviews.title: Terrible autofocus, old and outdated
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasted me for 10 years, before finally kicking the bucket. The auto focus was TERRIBLE though. It was always adjusting focus, and software and drivers never fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: one of my friends has a logitech it smears the picture when you move to fast. I got this so I could record myself dancing HAHAHA. (its helped me improve my breakin moves) and it doesnt smear when I go into liquid pop moves. still have it the only thing i dont like is that it focuses in and out like every 2 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Best Web Cam I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Since 2012 till now ( Jun 2015) I'm using it without any problem. Only annoying part is auto focus. You may disable it from menu. This cam is perfect
customer_reviews.author: John Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure that I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It has good resolution but it's autofocus is messed up. It starts adjusting it self each 30 -60 seconds. I have not found how to disable it. As always software that came in the package with it leaves more to desire. In my case it basically works for my occasional communication needs but if I had to use it for day to day business needs I would replace it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Balametov

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good low budget webcam
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good low budget webcam, it still has a auto-focus problem even after the firmware update, but turning that off and setting it to the correct focus works well enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Really nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice overall, I only have 2 concerns with it. 1. The cable is too short for my PC, but that is my mistake since I didn't read that I needed to buy a male-to-female USB if I was going to use it on a desktop PC. 2. The auto-focus can be annoying, but only if you move your head around a lot while you chat (Doesn't bother me).
customer_reviews.author: Jesus A Padilla Diaz

customer_reviews.title: I thought I'd be saving a few bucks getting the ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd be saving a few bucks getting the one "for notebooks" but the clamp makes it nearly impossible to attach it to anything other than the top of a laptop screen. (Doesn't open wide enough for my PC monitor). I should have bought the desktop one.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Grea Price
customer_reviews.text: can not beat this for the price: use this on a older cpu without camera, use it for skype and it works great able to talk with family members around the world, nice clear pics, you can set up as you like for the available bandwidth you have
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is great! but it is constantly trying to refocus :(
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to find out that the auto-focus feature could not be turned off. The swivel adjustment of the camera is great and the mic picks up everything. The cord is a bit short, even for a notebook cam. Overall it gets the job done but it is no where near perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, great picture. EASY SETUP
customer_reviews.text: Much, much smaller than it looks like in the picture. Probably a little smaller than 1 inch cubed. Good picture. Insanely EASY SETUP. Step 1: Plug into USB port. Step 2: Wait about a minute while Windows 7 clicks and blinks at you. Step 3: Restart computer. Step 4: Miller time.
customer_reviews.author: Desperado

customer_reviews.title: Some bugs, but overall very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid web camera. The adjustment tools in the program are very useful for different lighting. If your LifeCam starts to blur every once and a while, go to the settings and deselect Auto-Focus. Proceed to drag the focus slider to the left hand side.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Paradis

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! The clip could be larger to accommodate a monitor. Ample size for attaching to a lab top. Seller upgraded shipping so product arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Bizjak

customer_reviews.title: The software that controls this camera defaults to autofocus which ...
customer_reviews.text: The software that controls this camera defaults to autofocus which never works correctly. You will need to manually remove autofocus and thereafter the camera will work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bak

customer_reviews.title: IT'S GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This webcam is pretty good for the price. Actually, it's pretty good period. The picture comes out clear and nice. Not a long cord so it's best used with a laptop like the discription says. The only problem with THIS particular model is it's not really compatible with Windows 8. I spoke to Microsoft and there are no drivers (software) that can upgrade it (as of the time I spoke to them in January 2013.
customer_reviews.author: wendasa

customer_reviews.title: Nice webcam
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, compact, well designed webcam with good colors and sharp images. Unfortunately the auto-focus is to much of a problem. It has been suggested to disable the auto-focus, but this is not possible from an android device which was the reason I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kikonyc

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Easy installation. It didn't fit my parents' screen (they have an older flat panel screen), but they like it so much that we figured out a way to attach it to a pencil holder.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Cakes

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Once I received the camera I loved it. It fits perfectly on top of my laptop. The only problem I have with it is the Auto Focus. I use the camera quite often (everyday) and I hate turning the auto focus off every time I want to use the camera. If you do not turn it off than you will look blurry most of the time you are using it. Overall great product my only con is the auto focus.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina K.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: But I can't say it's the best I need the world. It's a bit pixelated and the clip is extremely small. Good luck trying to get this to remain stabilized on anything thicker than 1/2".
customer_reviews.author: Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera with the Pefect Size cord!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera for my laptop. I did not want a long cord that was combersome to deal with. This camera comes with an 18-inch cord ... perfect size. And, the picture quality is super. I can highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality camera, autofocus issue that can be disabled
customer_reviews.text: The autofocus is weird but can be disabled. I use this with the Linux software Motion and it performs very well after I disabled autofocus via motion.conf
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W. Borgers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camert at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent webcam at a great price. Since it was made by Microsoft and I run Windows, there was no installation. I placed the webcam on top of my laptop and it installed itself and was ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Donald A. Kellum

customer_reviews.title: Good for chat.. Not for podcasting
customer_reviews.text: This camera is good only for laptops, software and firmware updates helped for a bit, then it burnt out on me then decided to work again. It gets very hot when recording videos or chatting. Wouldn't recommend it for podcasters just for occasional chatting, and light use.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Low price, small, mobile WebCam
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed this Cam and another one just because of how low the prices were. Its a Cam for Laptops but I have it in use on my desktop. Works great. I've used for Skype and taking pics or videos.
customer_reviews.author: J.O.Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Working great as part of my dash cam hooked up to my android powered car stereo. I catch all the bad drivers on this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: Only dislike is how much it focuses
customer_reviews.text: Often this camera will focus, and make it blurry. Besides that it works well, and I haven't had any problems. Only dislike is how much it focuses.
customer_reviews.author: Esmi Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Newer isn't always better.
customer_reviews.text: Decent clarity and sound, but don't like how the features work and that I have to adjust them every time. The cord is also quite short. Should have done my research and gone with the 3000.
customer_reviews.author: DanKayAquarius

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised...an HD(720.30fps) webcam
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my home security with a 3rd party software and I am pleased with the quality. I would recommed this to anyone using it as a low quality home security system.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent web cam
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my office where the lid of my web-cam equipped computer is always closed (in the docking station) so this is mounted on my large screen monitor. Used for video-conferencing.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Goat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic-ish
customer_reviews.text: I bought this webcam for picture taking,skype,and google voice with my family and its working great. It can auto-focus or manual focus. The tru color looks great outside. The visual effects are a little slow but are lots of fun. The only downside is the clip on base did not like the me trying to clip it on a Lego. (Stop motion videos are good with this the only downside is that it won't work with stop-motion programs like MonkeyJam,iKit,Helium Frog,or Anazi.) It is a very good webcam! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Theoneofcool

customer_reviews.title: No frills, just works.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my wife's failed built-in webcam on a Windows computer. It easily worked out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: BrianLTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: geat up date from old web cam
customer_reviews.text: The Microsoft web cam HD-6000 is a tremendous improvement over the one I had before.Light control,the auto focus,ability to swival camera head.The up dated apps from Microsoft are a riot to add to your picture. The only thing I wish I had paid attention to,is this web cam is for lap tops,will not fit on desk-top monitors,even an Led monitor.I recomend this Lifecam HD-6000 one hundred percent.Do compare pricing on this item,can very by five dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B. P.I., Me.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget cam
customer_reviews.text: Very small, cube form factor. Because it's for a notebook/laptop the cord is short, but with an extension it will work for any application. Hard to beat this 720p HD cam for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  🚑 & Jeff's Wife 💅Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely disappointed. The mic is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Having tried the LifeCam Cinema 720p, I thought I might give their consumer notebook version a try. I was extremely disappointed. The mic is garbage, the "autofocus" has to be fixed by turning it off, the white balance is terrible. It's just no good. Don't bother with this product. If you want a 720pm webcam just buy the Cinema version for a few dollars more. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: VeryWellThen

customer_reviews.title: Great for Skype
customer_reviews.text: inexpensive and works great. usb cable needs to be longer than the 2ft provided
customer_reviews.author: albert pozar

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My built-in laptop camera gave out so my husband got this camera for me to replace it. We Skype all the time with it and it's just great. Reliable, and provides clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Shadels

customer_reviews.title: Decent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with this camera. Using it with Lync at work. Gets a decent picture and don't have to worry about breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Product (One Minor Annoyance)
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, I got it to install and all of the features work perfectly. I got it to work on the highest resolutions for both still image and video capture without any problems. The only problem I had was when using video chat, the auto-focus kept trying to refocus even when I wasn't moving my body at all. I turned off the auto-focus using the built in software, so it is no longer a problem.
customer_reviews.author: asqueezy

customer_reviews.title: A great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I use a Govt Issued computer over here in Iraq, so needless to say it has no Webcam. This camera is great. Easy install, clips on solid, great resolution, great clarity, even in low or no light. It is a definate buy now.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Northam

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I give this rating because it serves the exact purpose I bought it for. I make videos with live commentaries on them but also have a laptop that I skype with for school of with friends moved away. It does wonderful. Great quality, funny effects and hasn't let me down after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Grammas

customer_reviews.title: Grainy...Fine but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It's small. The Camera is no so hot. it may output 720p but the quality is low ( grainy, terrible in low light). It's fine but not great.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this cam, and it is great quality with good picture that it projects! only downside I don't care for is the autofocus, but that can be turned off, just a burden.
customer_reviews.author: TexAg

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Lifecam
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this product...I was under the impression that since it was a Microsoft product, that it would be compatible with Windows 8 (actually advertised that it was, but is not)...very disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Robin Giles

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing how low quality the webcams on laptops are! With this little camera you can make programs like Skype really great! The only criticism I have is that the button on top of the camera only leads you to Microsoft Messenger!
customer_reviews.author: Saul J. Guznay

customer_reviews.title: HD!
customer_reviews.text: Really great picture quality. It was very good price for the quality. Really like the product. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: user_name_not_found

customer_reviews.title: Auto-focus and high resolution
customer_reviews.text: This webcam has auto-focus allowing us to capture images of a screen as close as 3 inches. The resolution is also perfect for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Luckster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift I get Great pictures back from the recipient
customer_reviews.author: foolishfisherman

customer_reviews.title: pretty junky
customer_reviews.text: Over all it looks like a nice unit and it even came with a nice pouch. Very simple to install and when its working it has a nice picture....but.... The thing keeps refocusing and refocusing as if I were moving closer and further away from it, I was sitting still. Even people who have viewed me have said that the constant refocusing gets annoying. I bought a basic no name webcam called (metal finish webcam) for only $7 and it works a whole lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Warner

customer_reviews.title: This item I am returned
customer_reviews.text: This working good and it came to me safty and on-time It did not work perfectly with window 8 even I have already updated firmware and driver
customer_reviews.author: HUNG T LE

customer_reviews.title: worth 20 bucks fo sho
customer_reviews.text: As a webcam model, I was made aware I need a good quality webcam, but I didn't have "good quality money". I bought this one going for at least decent quality, and it's a lot better than expected!! I'm surprised this is only 20 bucks! As all the other reviews say, disabling auto focus is a MUST. But other than that, sounds and video quality is lovely !!!
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: LifeCam HD6000
customer_reviews.text: This camera was shipped in excellent condition and it was like new. I downloaded the installation from the web because the installation disk was not included. It works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Oyhane Go

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super clean and for the price the pixels per viewing quality is the best . love it w skype
customer_reviews.author: RAWVIBES

customer_reviews.title: Good webcam but
customer_reviews.text: this webcam is constantly refocusing itself and sometimes it can be frustrating when trying to record a video or talk with people online.
customer_reviews.author: TheKingDavis

customer_reviews.title: Nice webcam
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice high quality camera except its constant focusing is seldom irritating a bit. Very good camera and the resolution is high quality. A very good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn13356

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality but auto focus is an issue
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality but auto focus is an issue. It seems like it constantly refocuses on the subject even though the subject hasn't moved. I just keep auto focus off and adjust it manually.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Martinelli

customer_reviews.title: ... on windows 8 it autofocuses all the time but great quality
customer_reviews.text: cant get proper software for it on windows 8 it autofocuses all the time but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Victor L. Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: Great little powerhouse webcam.
customer_reviews.text: It's a small size with a big range and gives a clear picture. it clamps on to the top of the monitor and holds secure.
customer_reviews.author: coral

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were very disappointed in this product. It only lasted a few months with just a few hours of Skype time, then it broke. We tried to re-install the program on multiple computers but the camera would not work. When we attempted to return, the policy had expired after 30 days from purchase. We will not buy any kind of product like this again!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The video camera is very good quality for this price is almost a must buy. The AF function can be a bit annoying but can be disabled.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE ALVARADO

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an older Windows box, it would not support the required software. So I returned it. your mileage may vary
customer_reviews.author: GlennT

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft lifecam HD 6000
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional product for the price. It picks up light in low light situations very well Will recommend to others My son loves his new cam
customer_reviews.author: Corey D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera and I love it. This is the second Microsoft Webcam that I bought. The other is a 1080p
customer_reviews.author: Frank Crosswell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice web cam with convenient swivel.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nice and compact and the swivel is a nice touch. Picture is very clear and voice is clear, also.
customer_reviews.author: jnandidl

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: The camera is ultimate for those who don't have a built in cam on there laptop. The camera has built in mic that has more clarity that the built in mic. The 360 degree rotation gives lot of flexibility. Attaching with laptop is so easy and it stands firm. Very happy with the shipment and the item. I will definitely recommend,
customer_reviews.author: Anidhi

customer_reviews.title: Webcam
customer_reviews.text: I bought and use it for my old Laptop as I used it for video chat with my friends right now my Old laptop isnt here anymore
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Amberg

customer_reviews.title: Works well, installs with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Nicely designed, works great under Linux, Mac, and Windows-- has a clear picture, and pretty good auto-focus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Steven Mundt

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for some skype calls and such. it clips right on my pc monitor. Auto focus works well.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome HD web cam.
customer_reviews.text: Great, awesome quality picture and sound, the only thing is I'd highly suggest turning off auto focus in the menu.
customer_reviews.author: I Kisala

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft LifeCam HD-6000 720p HD Webcam for Notebooks
customer_reviews.text: This webcam works great for me for the price and the features it has. I read some previous reviews regarding the auto focus issues with this webcam. The auto focus works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon man

customer_reviews.title: It was for my wife to talk to her relatives
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say, I like the product and it keep her occupied, but with Skype it lowers those phone bills.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a coworker. worked as advertised. Well packaged. No surprises .... .... .... .... .... .... .... .... .... ....
customer_reviews.author: DebH

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in a somewhat timely manner, the picture on amazon of the camera made it look way bigger.. its very small/petite. the visual ability is ok, when in webcam mode it takes awhile for it to automatically focus so its blurry off and on the whole time especially if I move around.
customer_reviews.author: journeysworld

customer_reviews.title: Cool enough
customer_reviews.text: Cool enough for talking face-to-face! But not cool enough in recording vedios!! Did the work of expected! Pleased about it!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice find
customer_reviews.text: Using this on my laptop and works great. Not the newest choice out, but the price and quality make it hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again and again!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good picture quality and great sound from the mic.
customer_reviews.author: chellshokr

customer_reviews.title: Lifecam Falls a bit short
customer_reviews.text: Constant auto focus changes. Constant light changes. Just not what you'd expect from Microsoft. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bobazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Camera. The only problem is that the camera auto zooms alot. I got over it rather quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: David Caza

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: excellent product. I commend you for your attention so I will continue to work very well. thanks thousand blessings to all
customer_reviews.author: DOUHER

customer_reviews.title: LifeCam HD-6000
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an avid Video/Webcam guy, but I like this one. I've tried a couple webcams now and I like this petite camera. The auto-focus 720p resolution works very nice with my Lync Online beta. It's for Laptops, so don't think you'll be mounting this on your LCD unless you have a thin depth LCD monitor and a decent bezel.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Heredia

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Inexpensive, easy setup, works great! I'm using it for a security camera and it's doing the job.
customer_reviews.author: L. Green

product_meta.title: Microsoft LifeCam HD-6000 720p HD Webcam for Notebooks - Black
product_meta.description:
Style:RetailFROM THE MANUFACTURER


MICROSOFT LIFECAM HD-6000 FOR NOTEBOOKS

Do more things together when you're apart with Skype video calling 

GREAT HD VIDEO FOR LIFE ON THE GO
Share life on-the-go with the LifeCam HD-6000. Snap it on to your notebook, and capture the excitement of life around you—wherever that may be. Featuring a 720p HD sensor, the LifeCam HD-6000 automatically sharpens your images with Auto Focus while TrueColor adjusts exposure for bright, vibrant footage. Plus, you're sure to catch every angle with the 360° lens rotation while the widescreen presents a remarkably cinematic feel.



PRODUCT FEATURES


 1. 720P HD VIDEO CHAT
    For a true HD-quality experience.
    
    
 2. TRUECOLOR TECHNOLOGY WITH FACE TRACKING
    Automatically controls exposure for bright and colorful video.
    
    
 3. COMPACT DESIGN
    Easily attaches to your notebook or laptop.
    
    
 4. 360-DEGREE ROTATION
    Rotates halfway in both directions for an all-around view.
    
    
 5. WIDESCREEN
    16:9 format offers cinematic video recording.
    
    

FIND A WEBCAM THAT'S RIGHT FOR YOU:
Webcam LifeCam HD-3000 LifeCam HD-5000 LifeCam HD-6000 for Notebooks LifeCam Cinema LifeCam Studio Product HD Video Good HD Video Mobile HD Video Better HD Video Best HD Video Video Resolution 720p (1280 x 720) 720p (1280 x 720) 720p (1280 x 720) 720p (1280 x 720) 1080p (1920 x 1080) Lens Plastic Element Lens Plastic Element Lens Plastic Element Lens Glass Element Lens Premium Glass Lens Microphone Digital Microphone Noise Reduction Microphone Noise Reduction Microphone Noise Reduction Microphone High-Fidelity Microphone TrueColor Technology Auto Focus 360° View Range ClearFrame Technology Aluminum Body Carrying Case Lens Cap SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
 * Computer/Operating System
   Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP with Service Pack 2 (SP2) or higher (Excluding Windows XP 64-bit); minimum: Intel Dual-Core 1.6 GHz or higher, 1 GB of RAM; recommended: Intel Dual-Core 3.0 GHz or higher, 2 GB of RAM
 * Hard Drive
   1.5 GB free
 * Other
   USB 2.0
   Windows-compatible speakers or headphones
feature_bullets: HD-quality video at up to 30 fps.
